publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4819 Kenny MacAskill: The Draft Mutual Recognition of Criminal Financial Penalties in the European Union (Scotland) Order 2009—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Mutual Recognition of Criminal Financial Penalties in the European Union (Scotland) Order 2009 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*

S3M-4819 Kenny MacAskill: The Draft Mutual Recognition of Criminal Financial Penalties in the European Union (Scotland) Order 2009—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Mutual Recognition of Criminal Financial Penalties in the European Union (Scotland) Order 2009 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing
